query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: Functional “SMARTER Finance for Families” residential green finance online platform, with suitable content, that meets the needs of all relevant stakeholders
result.description:
Functional “SMARTER Finance for Families” residential green finance online platform, with suitable content, that meets the needs of all relevant stakeholders, including: -the currently Implementing Partners of the SMARTER project, -the European Advisory Board and interested members of the green investment community for the “Green Homes Investment Platform”, (this section to launch in M8) -the project partners responsible for WP8 “Communications & Awareness Building” according to the requisite project schedule.
All project consortium partners should display sufficient understanding of how to use the “Knowledge Management System” for project purposes. – Lead Partner: DTU (M4)

result.title: Recommended Adjustments to incorporate the Level(s) framework
result.description: Recommended Adjustments to incorporate the Level(s) framework and acceptance of those adjustments into the EE/Green Homes certification tools in use by Implementing Partners during the pilot phase. These will be divided into all immediate adjustments that are feasible to implement during the SMARTER project period as well as (if necessary) a road map detailing how the Green Homes certifications will evolve over time.

result.title: ACCEPT business scenarios, use cases & requirements
result.description: The deliverable will document in detail the project use cases grouping them under different business scenarios This will form the basis for user requirement extraction The requirements will be defined from diverse perspectives covering the multiple stakeholders which participate in ACCEPT framework namely energy communities retailers aggregators ESCOs and DSOs Feedback from Living Lab workshops will be included in the requirement definition as well as a report on regulatory legal socioeconomic and market barriers imposed in all four 4 ACCEPT pilot sites

result.title: Demonstration activity report from the Swiss pilot site v1
result.description: Further to the hardware and software deployment in the Swiss pilot site and based on the validation scenarios of D67 the deliverable will include the specific demonstration plan with the local regulatory and community objectives and the preparation of the pilot testbed for the ACCEPT solution operation

result.title: ACCEPT system architecture description v1
result.description: The deliverable will present the ACCEPT architecture design model including a logical view of all different components The mapping of the overall structure on SGAM will be included in order to provide a point of reference among other BRIDGE projects Additionally based on deliverable D21 the work on usecase scenarios and deriving requirements will be further enhanced through sequence diagrams and complemented through the definition of module functional and nonfunctional requirements The implementation view will comprise module description development and deployment information as well as interface specification
